---
title: Submit Validator Address
slug: /staking/solana/delegate/submit-validator-address
---

Now that the stake account is created, submit a delegation transaction to activate the stake.

The previous response indicates one required input: `validator_address`.

### Parameters

- `validator_address` &mdash; The vote address of the validator to which the SOL will be delegated (required).

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/e2285668-f6ab-4b77-9e96-edbcca63cd24/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
    "name": "create_delegate_tx",
    "inputs": {
      "validator_address": "DNTc4P9ngY51Uc8hXSjhJdZdLTxyx7j1N1GbfXjVkLPr"
    }
}'
```

### Response

You can find the unsigned, serialized transaction in `data[create_delegate_tx][raw]`.

There are three possible `actions`:

- `refresh_delegate_tx` &mdash; If you need to get a fresh version of the transaction payload.
- `sign_delegate_tx` &mdash; Submit a signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.
- `confirm_delegate_tx_by_hash` &mdash; Submit a previously completed transaction hash to continue the flow.

We will choose `sign_delegate_tx`, so note that it indicates one input to collect:

- `transaction_payload` &mdash; The signed transaction payload ready to be broadcast to the network.

#### Sample Response

```json {4,7,26,29,42,90,93}
{
  "id": "e2285668-f6ab-4b77-9e96-edbcca63cd24",
  "operation": "staking",
  "state": "delegate_tx_signature",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "refresh_delegate_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "validator_address",
          "display": "Vote Account Public Key",
          "description": "",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": "DNTc4P9ngY51Uc8hXSjhJdZdLTxyx7j1N1GbfXjVkLPr"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "sign_delegate_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "transaction_payload",
          "display": "Transaction Payload",
          "description": "",
          "type": "signed_transaction",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "sign_payload",
              "options": {}
            }
          ],
          "array": false,
          "default_value": null,
          "signers": ["Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy"],
          "transaction_payload": ""
        },
        {
          "name": "signatures",
          "display": "Signatures",
          "description": "",
          "type": "array_of_signatures",
          "validations": [],
          "array": true,
          "default_value": null,
          "element_type": "signature_data",
          "signers": ["Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy"],
          "transaction_payload": "",
          "signing_payload": "",
          "inputs": [
            {
              "name": "account_address",
              "display": "Account Address",
              "description": "",
              "type": "string",
              "validations": [
                {
                  "type": "presence",
                  "options": {}
                }
              ],
              "array": false,
              "default_value": null
            },
            {
              "name": "signature",
              "display": "Signature",
              "description": "",
              "type": "string",
              "validations": [
                {
                  "type": "presence",
                  "options": {}
                }
              ],
              "array": false,
              "default_value": null

          ]

          "display": "Block Number",
          "description": "",

          "default_value": null
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "stake_account_pubkey": "9UPYJp5pApSEaeCizrvqe6vx7hSj3ZPzVDLZHG4hxk3x",
    "create_stake_account_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "28xHAnmmVY6A2wfwe4v1LeoeS3qPBYL4haajmswwfVZ4JVsobeTCzoksVjZjgzzKtbJpCnraCquUwTiYRvkXpoKb",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [

      ],

    },
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "amount": "4.0",
    "validator_address": "DNTc4P9ngY51Uc8hXSjhJdZdLTxyx7j1N1GbfXjVkLPr",
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": null,
      "hash": null,
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": null,

    "delegation_inactive_amount": null,
    "delegation_status": null,
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "estimated_active_at": null

  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "devnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T07:04:33.714Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-28T08:01:54.481Z"
}
```

:::info note

Make sure to save the `transaction_payload` from this response, which is what needs to be signed in the next step.

:::
